sent.orig: Declare your menu with MENU keyword.
sent.trans: 用MENU关键字声明你的菜单。

sent.orig: The most common application menu is revealed by pressing the MENU key on the device.
sent.trans: 最通常的应用程序菜单是通过按下设备的MENU键显示。

sent.orig: To begin the update, turn your camera on while holding down the MENU button.
sent.trans: 现在开始升级，开机的时候按住MENU键。

sent.orig: Menu bar: Click on a menu item to display the menu and its commands.
sent.trans: 菜单栏：单击一个菜单名称后将会显示出整个菜单和它的命令。

sent.orig: Define a popup menu with four menu items, the third one is a menu separator.
sent.trans: 定义了一个有四个菜单项的弹出式菜单，第三个菜单是分隔符。
